issue.title: [C++] Add to cpp/examples minimal examples of using Arrow as a dependency of another CMake project
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7607](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7607). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be helpful to third party developers to have a working example of how we are expecting CMake users to build and use Arrow as an external project in their CMake C++ projects
